line_1: "With foulest sprites the sons of men affray,
line_2: Exclaim'd the Squire astound," ah! wealaway!

line_1: "With foulest sprites the sons of men affray,
line_2: "And blot for ever the fair face of day.

line_1: "With foulest sprites the sons of men affray,
line_2: "Oh! ne'er believe, ye youths, what women say.

line_1: For long he fought, nor left the dire affray
line_2: Nor, though his ensigns lost the doubtful day,

line_1: Soon chaced the gathering clouds of black affray,
line_2: And climbing to his steed march thence away,

line_1: Soon chaced the gathering clouds of black affray,
line_2: With freer spirit, and with aspect gay

line_1: Soon chaced the gathering clouds of black affray,
line_2: Of myriads, who confess his sov'ran sway,
